plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Floway uses your location while the app is open and in the background to record your entire running route, even if you lock your phone or switch to another app.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Floway requires background location access to continue tracking your run when the app is not visible, ensuring no part of your route is missed.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Floway uses your location while the app is in use to track and show your running route, speed, and progress on the map.

plugins.faceIDPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your Face ID for secure authentication.
plugins.fingerprintPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your fingerprint for secure authentication.
